name: GlucoseToleranceTestingLOINC
title: Glucose Tolerance Testing (LOINC)
description: This value set contains LOINC concepts for glucose tolerance lab testing.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains LOINC concepts for glucose tolerance lab testing.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people for whom glucose tolerance tests have been ordered or resulted. This element may map to "Assessment" or "Laboratory" category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for glucose tolerance test orders and results.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts for gestational glucose tolerance test orders and results.)
